analyzed: 我此生中，於三十八恒河沙佛所淨修梵行，或有佛所一日一夜淨修梵行，或有佛所七日七夜淨修梵行，或有佛所半月、一月、一歲、百歲、萬歲、億歲、那由他歲，乃至不可說不可說歲，或一小劫、或半大劫、或一大劫、或百大劫，乃至不可說不可說大劫，聽聞妙法，受行其教，莊嚴諸願，入所證處，淨修諸行，滿足六種波羅蜜海。
translated: In this life, I have cultivated pure conduct in the presence of thirty-eight Ganges river sands of Buddhas. In the presence of some Buddhas, I cultivated pure conduct for one day and night; in the presence of some Buddhas, I cultivated pure conduct for seven days and nights; in the presence of some Buddhas, for half a month, one month, one year, one hundred years, ten thousand years, one hundred thousand years, one million years, up to inexpressibly inexpressible years; in the presence of some Buddhas, for one small kalpa, half a great kalpa, one great kalpa, one hundred great kalpas, up to inexpressibly inexpressible great kalpas. I listened to the wonderful Dharma, received and practiced the teachings, adorned various vows, entered the places of realization, cultivated various practices, and fulfilled the ocean of the six perfections.

original: 亦見彼佛成道說法，各各差別，無有雜亂，住持遺教，乃至滅盡。
analyzed: 亦見彼佛成道說法，各各差別，無有雜亂，住持遺教，乃至滅盡。
translated: I also see those Buddhas attaining enlightenment and expounding the Dharma, each with distinctions, without confusion, upholding the remaining teachings until their extinction.

original: 亦知彼佛本所興願，以三昧願力嚴淨一切諸佛國土，以入一切行三昧力淨修一切諸菩薩行，以普賢乘出離力清淨一切佛波羅蜜。
analyzed: 亦知彼佛本所興願，以三昧願力嚴淨一切諸佛國土，以入一切行三昧力淨修一切諸菩薩行，以普賢乘出離力清淨一切佛波羅蜜。
translated: I also know the original vows of those Buddhas, purifying all Buddha-lands with the power of samādhi vows, purifying all bodhisattva practices with the power of entering the samādhi of all practices, and purifying all the pāramitās of Buddhas with the power of departure on the Pervasive Vehicle.

original: 「又，善男子！
analyzed: 「又，善男子！
translated: Moreover, good man!

original: 我經行時，一念中，一切十方皆悉現前，智慧清淨故；
analyzed: 我經行時，一念中，一切十方皆悉現前，智慧清淨故；
translated: When I am practicing walking meditation, in a single thought, all the worlds in the ten directions appear before me, due to the purity of wisdom;

original: 一念中，一切世界皆悉現前，經過不可說不可說世界故；
analyzed: 一念中，一切世界皆悉現前，經過不可說不可說世界故；
translated: in a single thought, all worlds appear before me, because I have passed through worlds beyond description in an instant;

analyzed: 一念中，不可說不可說佛剎皆悉嚴淨，成就大願力故；
translated: in a single thought, worlds beyond description are all purified and adorned, because I have accomplished the power of great vows;

original: 一念中，不可說不可說眾生差別行皆悉現前，滿足十力智故；
analyzed: 一念中，不可說不可說眾生差別行皆悉現前，滿足十力智故；
translated: in a single thought, the different practices of beings beyond description all appear before me, because I have fulfilled the wisdom of the ten powers;

original: 一念中，不可說不可說諸佛清淨身皆悉現前，成就普賢行願力故；
analyzed: 一念中，不可說不可說諸佛清淨身皆悉現前，成就普賢行願力故；
translated: In one thought, the pure bodies of ineffably ineffable buddhas all appear before them, because they have accomplished the power of Samantabhadra's practices and vows;

original: 一念中，恭敬供養不可說不可說佛剎微塵數如來，成就柔軟心供養如來願力故；
analyzed: 一念中，恭敬供養不可說不可說佛剎微塵數如來，成就柔軟心供養如來願力故；
translated: In one thought, they respectfully make offerings to tathāgatas as numerous as the dust particles in an ineffably ineffable number of buddha lands, because they have accomplished the power of the vow to make offerings to tathāgatas with a gentle mind;

original: 一念中，領受不可說不可說如來法，得證阿僧祇差別法住持法輪陀羅尼力故；
analyzed: 一念中，領受不可說不可說如來法，得證阿僧祇差別法住持法輪陀羅尼力故；
translated: In one thought, they receive the teachings of ineffably ineffable tathāgatas and attain the power of the dhāraṇī to uphold and turn the Dharma wheel of incalculably many distinctions, because they have attained the power of the dhāraṇī to uphold and turn the Dharma wheel of incalculably many distinctions;

original: 一念中，不可說不可說菩薩行海皆悉現前，得能淨一切行如因陀羅網願力故；
analyzed: 一念中，不可說不可說菩薩行海皆悉現前，得能淨一切行如因陀羅網願力故；
translated: In one thought, the ocean of ineffably ineffable bodhisattva practices all appear before them, because they have attained the power of the vow to purify all practices like the net of Indra;

original: 一念中，不可說不可說諸三昧海皆悉現前，得於一三昧門入一切三昧門皆令清淨願力故；
analyzed: 一念中，不可說不可說諸三昧海皆悉現前，得於一三昧門入一切三昧門皆令清淨願力故；
translated: In one thought, the ocean of ineffably ineffable samādhis all appear before them, because they have attained the power of the vow to enter all gates of samādhi and purify them within a single samādhi gate;

original: 一念中，不可說不可說諸根海皆悉現前，得了知諸根際於一根中見一切根願力故；
analyzed: 一念中，不可說不可說諸根海皆悉現前，得了知諸根際於一根中見一切根願力故；
translated: In a single thought, the ocean of innumerable and boundless faculties all appear before me. I have attained the knowledge of the limits of the faculties and see all faculties within a single faculty by the power of vows.

original: 一念中，不可說不可說佛剎微塵數時皆悉現前，得於一切時轉法輪眾生界盡法輪無盡願力故；
analyzed: 一念中，不可說不可說佛剎微塵數時皆悉現前，得於一切時轉法輪眾生界盡法輪無盡願力故；
translated: In a single thought, the times of innumerable and boundless buddha lands appear before me. I have attained the turning of the wheel of the Dharma in all times, with the wheel of the Dharma inexhaustible as long as the realm of beings is inexhaustible, by the power of vows.

original: 一念中，不可說不可說一切三世海皆悉現前，得了知一切世界中一切三世分位智光明願力故。
analyzed: 一念中，不可說不可說一切三世海皆悉現前，得了知一切世界中一切三世分位智光明願力故。
translated: In a single thought, the ocean of all the past, present, and future appears before me. I have attained the wisdom light that knows the positions of all the past, present, and future in all worlds, by the power of vows.

original: 「善男子！
analyzed: 「善男子！
translated: Good man!

original: 我唯知此菩薩隨順燈解脫門。
analyzed: 我唯知此菩薩隨順燈解脫門。
translated: I only know this bodhisattva's liberation of following the lamp.

original: 如諸菩薩摩訶薩如金剛燈，於如來家真正受生，具足成就不死命根，常然智燈無有盡滅，其身堅固不可沮壞，現於如幻色相之身，如緣起法無量差別，隨眾生心各各示現，形貌色相世無倫匹，毒刃火災所不能害，如金剛山無能壞者，降伏一切諸魔外道；
analyzed: 如諸菩薩摩訶薩如金剛燈，於如來家真正受生，具足成就不死命根，常然智燈無有盡滅，其身堅固不可沮壞，現於如幻色相之身，如緣起法無量差別，隨眾生心各各示現，形貌色相世無倫匹，毒刃火災所不能害，如金剛山無能壞者，降伏一切諸魔外道；
translated: Just as the Bodhisattva-Mahāsattvas, like vajra lamps, are truly born in the Tathāgata family, fully accomplish the immortal life-faculty, always burn the lamp of wisdom without exhaustion or extinction, their bodies are solid and indestructible, manifesting illusory forms, like the Dharma of dependent origination with immeasurable distinctions, manifesting various appearances according to the minds of sentient beings, with forms and features unmatched in the world, unharmed by poison, weapons, or fire, like an adamantine mountain that cannot be destroyed, subduing all demons and non-Buddhists;

original: 其身妙好如真金山，於天人中最為殊特，名稱廣大靡不聞知，觀諸世間咸對目前，演深法藏如海無盡，放大光明普照十方。
analyzed: 其身妙好如真金山，於天人中最為殊特，名稱廣大靡不聞知，觀諸世間咸對目前，演深法藏如海無盡，放大光明普照十方。
translated: Their bodies are wondrous and beautiful like a true golden mountain, most distinguished among gods and humans, with vast fame known everywhere, observing all worlds as if present before their eyes, expounding the profound Dharma treasury like an inexhaustible ocean, emitting great light illuminating the ten directions.

original: 若有見者，必破一切障礙大山，必拔一切不善根本，必令種植廣大善根。
analyzed: 若有見者，必破一切障礙大山，必拔一切不善根本，必令種植廣大善根。
translated: Those who see them will surely destroy all great mountains of obstructions, surely uproot all unwholesome roots, and surely cause vast wholesome roots to be planted.

original: 如是之人，難可得見，難可出世；
analyzed: 如是之人，難可得見，難可出世；
translated: Such a person is difficult to encounter and difficult to appear in the world;

original: 而我云何能知能說彼功德行？
analyzed: 而我云何能知能說彼功德行？
translated: How can I know and speak of their merits and practices?

analyzed: 「善男子！

analyzed: 汝詣彼問：

analyzed: 菩薩云何學菩薩行、修菩薩道？
translated: How should a bodhisattva learn the bodhisattva practices and cultivate the bodhisattva path?

original: 」時，善財童子為欲究竟菩薩勇猛清淨之行，欲得菩薩大力光明，欲修菩薩無勝無盡諸功德行，欲滿菩薩堅固大願，欲成菩薩廣大深心，欲持菩薩無量勝行，於菩薩法心無厭足，願入一切菩薩功德，欲常攝御一切眾生，欲超生死稠林曠野，於善知識常樂見聞，承事供養無有厭倦；
analyzed: 」時，善財童子為欲究竟菩薩勇猛清淨之行，欲得菩薩大力光明，欲修菩薩無勝無盡諸功德行，欲滿菩薩堅固大願，欲成菩薩廣大深心，欲持菩薩無量勝行，於菩薩法心無厭足，願入一切菩薩功德，欲常攝御一切眾生，欲超生死稠林曠野，於善知識常樂見聞，承事供養無有厭倦；
translated: At that time, the youth Sudhana, wishing to perfect the bodhisattvas' courageous and pure practices, wishing to attain the bodhisattvas' powerful and radiant light, wishing to cultivate the bodhisattvas' unsurpassed and inexhaustible practices of merit and virtue, wishing to fulfill the bodhisattvas' firm great vows, wishing to accomplish the bodhisattvas' vast and profound intentions, wishing to uphold the bodhisattvas' immeasurable excellent practices, never tiring of the bodhisattva teachings, wishing to enter all the bodhisattvas' meritorious virtues, wishing to always guide and lead all beings, wishing to transcend the dense forests and wildernesses of birth and death, always delighting in seeing and hearing the good and wise advisors, serving and making offerings to them without weariness;

original: 頂禮其足，遶無量匝，慇懃瞻仰，辭退而去。
analyzed: 頂禮其足，遶無量匝，慇懃瞻仰，辭退而去。
translated: he bowed his head to the monk's feet, circumambulated him innumerable times, earnestly gazed up at him, took his leave, and departed.

translated: At that time, the youth Sudhana, having received the teachings of the monk Supratiṣṭhita, recited and upheld them, contemplated and cultivated them, clearly and decisively, and attained realization and entry into that Dharma door.

analyzed: 我昔曾於文殊師利童子所，修學書、數、算、印等法，即得悟入一切工巧神通智法門。
translated: I once studied writing, calculation, mathematics, seals, and other methods under the youth Mañjuśrī, and immediately attained realization of the Dharma door of the wisdom and spiritual powers of all crafts.

original: 善男子！
analyzed: 善男子！
translated: Good man!

translated: Because of this Dharma door, I know the worldly methods of writing, calculation, mathematics, seals, the elements, and so forth. I can also cure all illnesses such as wind, epilepsy, consumption, and possession by ghosts. I can also build cities, towns, villages, gardens, forests, terraces, pavilions, palaces, houses, and various other places. I am also skilled in refining various elixirs and managing fields, farming, commerce, and all other occupations, and I can always obtain what is appropriate in terms of accepting or rejecting, advancing or retreating.

original: 又善別知眾生身相，作善作惡，當生善趣，當生惡趣，此人應得聲聞乘道，此人應得緣覺乘道，此人應入一切智地，如是等事皆悉能知。

translated: They are also well able to discern the physical characteristics of sentient beings, knowing what good and evil they have done, where they will be reborn in the good or evil destinies, which person should attain the path of the śrāvaka vehicle, which person should attain the path of the pratyekabuddha vehicle, and which person should enter the stage of omniscience.
